import React, { useContext } from 'react' import './Navbar.css' import logo from '../Assests/logo.png' import cart_icon from '../Assests/cart_icon.png' import { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { ShopContext } from '../Context/ShopContext' const Navbar = () => { const [menu,setMenu]=useState("shop"); const{getTotalCartItems}=useContext(ShopContext); return (

ReadIt Potter

  • {setMenu("shop")}}>Shop{menu=="shop"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("fiction")}}>Fiction{menu=="fiction"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("novels")}}>Novels{menu=="novels"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("kids")}}>Kids{menu=="kids"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("nonfic")}}>Non-Fiction{menu=="nonfic"?
    :<>}
{localStorage.getItem('auth-token')? : }
{getTotalCartItems()}
) } export default Navbar
